Module HW08
Package common.message.command

Class AMsgCmd<TMsg extends IMsg,​H extends provided.datapacket.DataPacket<? super TMsg,​?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • provided.datapacket.ADataPacketAlgoCmd<java.lang.Void,​IMsg,​java.lang.Void,​ICmd2ModelAdapter,​H>
      • common.message.command.AMsgCmd<TMsg,​H>
  • Type Parameters:
    TMsg - most specific type of message being processed
    H - data packet host type of the message being processed
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, provided.extvisitor.IExtVisitorCmd<java.lang.Void,​provided.datapacket.IDataPacketID,​java.lang.Void,​provided.datapacket.ADataPacket>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ARoomMsgCmd, AUserMsgCmd
    public abstract class AMsgCmd<TMsg extends IMsg,​H extends provided.datapacket.DataPacket<? super TMsg,​?>>
extends provided.datapacket.ADataPacketAlgoCmd<java.lang.Void,​IMsg,​java.lang.Void,​ICmd2ModelAdapter,​H>
    Abstract command that processes a message hosted by a data packet with an arbitrary sender. These commands return nothing and take no input parameters.
    Author:
    ChatApp Design Group B
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • readObject

        private void readObject​(java.io.ObjectInputStream stream)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Reinitializes transient fields upon deserialization. See the Serializable marker interface docs. taskView is set to a default value for now (ILocalTaskViewAdapter.DEFAULT_ADAPTER).
        Parameters:
        stream - The object stream with the serialized data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the input stream cannot be read correctly
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the class file associated with the input stream cannot be located.

      • setCmd2ModelAdpt

        public void setCmd2ModelAdpt​(ICmd2ModelAdapter cmd2ModelAdpt)
        Description copied from class: provided.datapacket.ADataPacketAlgoCmd
        Sets the ICmd2ModelAdapter for this command to use to communicate with the local ChatApp host system. Any implementation that saves this reference should mark its internal ICmd2ModelAdapter field as "transient" to prevent it from being serialized during any transport process.
        Specified by:
        setCmd2ModelAdpt in class provided.datapacket.ADataPacketAlgoCmd<java.lang.Void,​IMsg,​java.lang.Void,​ICmd2ModelAdapter,​H extends provided.datapacket.DataPacket<? super TMsg,​?>>
        Parameters:
        cmd2ModelAdpt - The adapter to the ChatApp model.

      • configCmd

        protected void configCmd()
        A configuration method provided as a service to subclasses that would like to do any additional configuration after the command to model adapter is set. Examples: Logging success of setting the adapter, incrementing a foreign command count in the host, etc.
